about_the_game:
A train operating game set in Hakone, a town rich in Japanese culture!


Hakone is a popular tourist destination, rich in nature and authentic Japanese culture.
Become a train operator of the Hakone Tozan Railway, a famous mountain railway that runs through the mountains of Hakone.

Experience the thrill of a mountain train through real footage!


Enjoy exciting footage from inside the train as it travels steep slopes and sharp curves.
The attraction is the powerful operating experience that can only be achieved through real footage taken from an actual Japanese train.

Full of Hakone Travel Information!


There is plenty of tourist information about Hakone, including the famous Hakone route called the Hakone Golden Course, where you can experience traveling by cable car, ropeway and pirate ship on Lake Ashinoko!
Enjoy photos and videos of popular Japanese tourist spots such as Mt. Fuji, hot springs and shrines!

Full of Hakone Travel Information!


There is plenty of tourist information about Hakone, including the famous Hakone route called the Hakone Golden Course, where you can experience traveling by cable car, ropeway and pirate ship on Lake Ashinoko!
Enjoy photos and videos of popular Japanese tourist spots such as Mt. Fuji, hot springs and shrines!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 26 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Next stop Hakone! Come operate the Hakone Tozan Train, a famous mountain train located in Hakone, one of Japan's top tourist destinations! Experience the spring and autumn seasons in Hakone!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
